author: schor
msg: no Jira - svn ignore generated folders and .classpath .project

author: rhuijben
msg: * subversion/libsvn_wc/adm_ops.c
(svn_wc_get_pristine_copy_path): Make sure our non existent path uses the
real administrative directory instead of just .svn tagged to the
directory where the file lives in.

author: rhuijben
msg: Use svn_wc__db_read_pristine_info() instead of svn_wc__db_read_info() in
svn_wc__get_pristine_contents() to allow access to the pristine files of
deleted paths again.
Until recently this function would have worked 'ok' on deleted nodes,
because we kept stale information in the deleted node information in wc.db.
* subversion/libsvn_wc/adm_files.c
(svn_wc__text_base_path_to_read): Synchronize checks with
svn_wc__get_pristine_contents.
(svn_wc__get_pristine_contents): Use svn_wc__db_read_pristine_info. Remove
scan addition call as we already know if we have a checksum and scan
addition doesn't work on deleted nodes.

author: igalic
msg: [TS-755] help init daemons like upstart keep track of *all* traffic server's
daemons when started via traffic_cop.
See also:
http://www.mail-archive.com/dev@trafficserver.apache.org/msg02542.html
